text: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm
author: Winston Churchill

text: The mind is everything. What you think you become
author: Buddha

text: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light
author: Plato

text: Always forgive your enemies. Nothing annoys them more
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Never compare your love story with those in the movies, because they are written by scriptwriters. Yours is written by God
author: Shah Rukh Khan

text: Only two things are infinite â€” the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former
author: Albert Einstein

text: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened
author: Dr. Seuss
